steps.description: crack-crack one egg in a bowl
add-1/2 tsp ground black pepper to the bowl
steps.modified_description: add-1/2 tsp ground black pepper to the bowl, but splash some pepper outside

steps.description: Heat-Heat 1 tbsp oil in a small non-stick frying pan
steps.modified_description: Heat-Heat 1 tbsp oil in a small non-stick frying pan, but close the fire early and heat a short time

steps.description: add-add the chopped cilantro to the bowl
Beat-Beat the contents of the bowl
steps.modified_description: Stir the contents of the bowl slowly

steps.description: cook-cook the tomatoes cut-side down until they start to soften and colour
steps.modified_description: cook-cook the tomatoes cut-side down in a short time

errors.description: cook the tomatoes in a short time

steps.description: Pour-Pour the egg mixture into the pan
Scoop-Scoop the tomatoes from the pan
put-put tomatoes on a serving plate
steps.modified_description: put-put tomatoes on a serving bowl

steps.description: stir-stir gently with a wooden spoon so the egg that sets on the base of the pan moves to enable the uncooked egg to flow into the space
steps.modified_description: stir-stir rapidly with a wooden spoon so the egg that sets on the base of the pan moves to enable the uncooked egg to flow into the space

steps.description: Stop-Stop stirring when it's nearly cooked to allow it to set into an omelette
Transfer-Transfer omelette to the plate and serve with the tomatoes
